Posts.Content: My mom is having hand and foot pain, the doctor says this should improve now that she is off the arbaxane. Has anyone else experienced this symptom and did it actually get better once the arbaxane was stopped? Also her nails have turned black, has that improved after treatment?
Posts.Title: Arbaxane- side effects

Posts.Content: My mom has recurrent breast cancer(not inflammatory) and I just noticed a very angry looking red spot on my breast about the size of a nickel. It doesn't hurt. I feel a small superficial nodule in the center of the red area. Does anyone have experience with inflammatory breast cancer?
Posts.Title: Inflammatory Breast Cancer-early symptoms?
